trans-unit.source: Sets response.content to the result obtained by SimpleTemplateResponse.rendered_content, runs all post-rendering callbacks, and returns the resulting response object.
trans-unit.target: 将 response.content 设置为 SimpleTemplateResponse.rendered_content 获得的结果，运行所有渲染后回调，并返回结果响应对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets a cookie. The parameters are the same as in the Morsel cookie object in the Python standard library.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个cookie。参数与Python标准库中的 Morsel cookie对象中的参数相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets a header unless it has already been set.
trans-unit.target: 设置页眉,除非它已经被设置。

trans-unit.source: Sets a limit to the available choices for this field when this field is rendered using a ModelForm or the admin (by default, all objects in the queryset are available to choose). Either a dictionary, a Q object, or a callable returning a dictionary or Q object can be used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ModelForm 或admin 呈现此字段时，为该字段的可用选项设置限制（默认情况下，可以选择queryset中的所有对象）。可以使用字典， Q 对象或返回字典或 Q 对象的可调用对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets a test cookie to determine whether the user’s browser supports cookies. Due to the way cookies work, you won’t be able to test this until the user’s next page request. See Setting test cookies below for more information.
trans-unit.target: 设置测试cookie，以确定用户的浏览器是否支持cookie。由于Cookie的工作方式，您将无法在用户的下一页请求之前对其进行测试。有关更多信息，请参见下面的设置测试Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Sets of field names that, taken together, are indexed:
trans-unit.target: 一组字段名,合在一起,是有索引的。

trans-unit.source: Sets of field names that, taken together, must be unique:
trans-unit.target: 一组字段名,合在一起必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Sets or unsets the current time zone in the contained block. When the current time zone is unset, the default time zone applies.
trans-unit.target: 设置或取消设置块中的当前时区。当取消设置当前时区时,则使用默认时区。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current time zone. The timezone argument must be an instance of a tzinfo subclass or a time zone name.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前时区。该 timezone 参数必须是一个实例 tzinfo 的子类或一个时区名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DEBUG setting to True prior to running tests. This may help troubleshoot test failures.
trans-unit.target: 在运行测试之前，将 DEBUG 设置设置为 True 。这可能有助于对测试失败进行故障排除。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Cache-Control header to give a max age for the page – again, from the CACHE_MIDDLEWARE_SECONDS setting.
trans-unit.target: 再次从 CACHE_MIDDLEWARE_SECONDS 设置中，设置 Cache-Control 标头以提供页面的最长期限。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Content-Length header for non-streaming responses.
trans-unit.target: 设置非流式响应的 Content-Length 标头。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Expires header to the current date/time plus the defined CACHE_MIDDLEWARE_SECONDS.
trans-unit.target: 将 Expires 标头设置为当前日期/时间以及定义的 CACHE_MIDDLEWARE_SECONDS 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name and domain attributes to the value of get_host().
trans-unit.target: 将 name 和 domain 属性设置为 get_host() 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SRID [2] (Spatial Reference System Identity) of the geometry field to the given value. Defaults to 4326 (also known as WGS84, units are in degrees of longitude and latitude).
trans-unit.target: 将几何字段的SRID [2]（空间参考系统标识）设置为给定值。默认值为4326（也称为WGS84，单位为经度和纬度）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the database to use when importing spatial data. Default is 'default'.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在导入空间数据时使用的数据库。默认为 'default' 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the expiration time for the session. You can pass a number of different values:
trans-unit.target: 设置会话的过期时间。您可以传递多个不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given header name to the given value. Both header and value should be strings.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的标头名称设置为给定的值。两个 header 和 value 应弦。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given key to [value] (a list whose single element is value). Note that this, as other dictionary functions that have side effects, can only be called on a mutable QueryDict (such as one that was created via QueryDict.copy()).
trans-unit.target: 将给定键设置为 [value] （一个元素为 value 的列表）。请注意，这与其他具有副作用的字典功能一样，只能在可变的 QueryDict 上调用（例如通过 QueryDict.copy() 创建的一个）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given key to list_ (unlike __setitem__()).
trans-unit.target: 将给定键设置为 list_ （与 __setitem__() ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum message level that will be recorded by the messages framework. See message levels for more details.
trans-unit.target: 设置消息框架将记录的最低消息级别。有关更多详细信息，请参见消息级别。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the squashed migration. When omitted, the name is based on the first and last migration, with _squashed_ in between.
trans-unit.target: 设置压缩的迁移的名称。省略时，该名称基于第一次和最后一次迁移，中间有 _squashed_ 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the user’s password to the given raw string, taking care of the password hashing. Doesn’t save the AbstractBaseUser object.
trans-unit.target: 将用户的密码设置为给定的原始字符串，并注意密码哈希。不保存 AbstractBaseUser 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the user’s password to the given raw string, taking care of the password hashing. Doesn’t save the User object.
trans-unit.target: 将用户的密码设置为给定的原始字符串，并注意密码哈希。不保存 User 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the test environment by calling setup_test_environment() and setting DEBUG to self.debug_mode (defaults to False).
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 setup_test_environment() 并将 DEBUG 设置为 self.debug_mode （默认为 False ）来设置测试环境。

trans-unit.source: Setting DEBUG = False disables several features that are only useful in development. In addition, you can tune the following settings.
trans-unit.target: 设置 DEBUG = False 将禁用仅在开发中有用的一些功能。另外，您可以调整以下设置。

trans-unit.source: Setting LOGGING_CONFIG to None only means that the automatic configuration process is disabled, not logging itself. If you disable the configuration process, Django will still make logging calls, falling back to whatever default logging behavior is defined.
trans-unit.target: 将 LOGGING_CONFIG 设置为 None 仅表示禁用自动配置过程，而不记录自身。如果禁用配置过程，Django仍将进行日志记录调用，而回退到定义的默认日志记录行为。

trans-unit.source: Setting CSRF_COOKIE_SAMESITE = 'None' was allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允许设置 CSRF_COOKIE_SAMESITE = 'None' 。

trans-unit.source: Setting LANGUAGE_COOKIE_SAMESITE = 'None' was allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允许设置 LANGUAGE_COOKIE_SAMESITE = 'None' 。

trans-unit.source: Setting SESSION_COOKIE_SAMESITE = 'None' was allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允许设置 SESSION_COOKIE_SAMESITE = 'None' 。

trans-unit.target: 为所有响应设置 X-Frame-Options

trans-unit.target: X-Frame-Options 每个视图设置X框架选项

trans-unit.source: Setting available_apps to a list of applications instructs Django to behave as if only the models from these applications were available. The behavior of TransactionTestCase changes as follows:
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序列表中设置 available_apps 可以指示Django表现得好像只有这些应用程序中的模型可用。 TransactionTestCase 的行为更改如下：

trans-unit.source: Setting fail_silently=True only hides the MessageFailure that would otherwise occur when the messages framework disabled and one attempts to use one of the add_message family of methods. It does not hide failures that may occur for other reasons.
trans-unit.target: 设置 fail_silently=True 仅会隐藏 MessageFailure ，否则将在禁用消息框架并尝试使用 add_message 系列方法之一时发生该错误。它不会隐藏因其他原因而可能发生的故障。

trans-unit.source: Setting prefix_default_language to False removes the prefix from the default language (LANGUAGE_CODE). This can be useful when adding translations to existing site so that the current URLs won’t change.
trans-unit.target: 将 prefix_default_language 设置为 False 会从默认语言（ LANGUAGE_CODE ）中删除前缀。将翻译添加到现有网站时，此功能很有用，以使当前URL不会更改。

trans-unit.source: Setting require_ready to False allows looking up models while the app registry is being populated, specifically during the second phase where it imports models. Then get_model() has the same effect as importing the model. The main use case is to configure model classes with settings, such as AUTH_USER_MODEL.
trans-unit.target: 将 require_ready 设置为 False 允许在填充应用程序注册表时查找模型，尤其是在导入模型的第二阶段。然后， get_model() 与导入模型具有相同的效果。主要用例是使用诸如 AUTH_USER_MODEL 之类的设置来配置模型类。

trans-unit.source: Setting reset_sequences = True on a TransactionTestCase will make sure sequences are always reset before the test run:
trans-unit.target: 在 TransactionTestCase 上设置 reset_sequences = True 将确保在测试运行之前始终重置序列：

trans-unit.source: Setting it to False does not mean you can reference a swappable model even if it is swapped out - False means that the migrations made with this ForeignKey will always reference the exact model you specify (so it will fail hard if the user tries to run with a User model you don’t support, for example).
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为 False 并不意味着即使将其交换掉也可以引用可交换模型 False 表示使用此ForeignKey进行的迁移将始终引用您指定的确切模型（因此，如果用户尝试使用例如，您不支持的用户模型）。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to False prevents such a rollback. Before doing that, make sure you’ve rolled back the transaction to a known-good savepoint within the current atomic block! Otherwise you’re breaking atomicity and data corruption may occur.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为 False 可以防止这种回滚。在此之前，请确保已将事务回滚到当前原子块内的已知良好保存点！否则，您将破坏原子性，并且可能会发生数据损坏。

trans-unit.source: Setting names must be all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 设置名称必须全部为大写。

trans-unit.source: Setting the rollback flag to True forces a rollback when exiting the innermost atomic block. This may be useful to trigger a rollback without raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 将rollback标志设置为 True 会在退出最内部的原子块时强制进行回滚。这对于触发回滚而不引发异常很有用。

trans-unit.source: Setting the time zone of the database connection may be useful for running raw SQL queries involving date/time functions provided by the database, such as date_trunc, because their results depend on the time zone.
trans-unit.target: 设置数据库连接的时区对于运行涉及数据库提供的日期/时间功能（例如 date_trunc )的原始SQL查询可能很有用，因为它们的结果取决于时区。

trans-unit.target: 在AJAX请求中设置令牌

trans-unit.source: Setting this incorrectly can irreversibly (for some time) break your site. Read the HTTP Strict Transport Security documentation first.
trans-unit.target: 错误地设置此设置可能会（在一段时间内）不可逆转地破坏您的网站。首先阅读HTTP Strict Transport Security文档。

trans-unit.source: Setting this incorrectly can irreversibly (for the value of SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS) break your site. Read the HTTP Strict Transport Security documentation first.
trans-unit.target: 错误地设置此设置可能会 SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS 您的网站无法恢复（对于SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS的值）。首先阅读HTTP Strict Transport Security文档。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to False will disable coordinate transformations. In other words, geometries will be inserted into the database unmodified from their original state in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "False "将禁用坐标变换。换句话说,几何体将从数据源中的原始状态不加修改地插入到数据库中。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to the name, or a tuple of names, from the given model will create models unique only to the given name(s). Geometries from each feature will be added into the collection associated with the unique model. Forces the transaction mode to be 'autocommit'.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为给定模型的名称或名称元组将创建仅对给定名称唯一的模型。每个要素的几何将添加到与唯一模型关联的集合中。强制事务模式为 'autocommit' 。

trans-unit.target: Setup

trans-unit.source: Several contrib apps include models, and some apps depend on others. Since cross-database relationships are impossible, this creates some restrictions on how you can split these models across databases:
trans-unit.target: 几个contrib应用程序包括模型,一些应用程序依赖于其他应用程序。由于跨数据库关系是不可能的,这就对你如何在数据库之间分割这些模型产生了一些限制。

trans-unit.source: Several fields that use the mixin are provided:
trans-unit.target: 提供了几个使用mixin的字段。

trans-unit.source: Several of Django’s built-in views are documented in Writing views as well as elsewhere in the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 在编写视图以及文档的其他地方都记录了Django的几个内置视图。

trans-unit.source: Several of Django’s bundled applications make use of the latter technique. For example, the permissions system in Django’s authentication framework uses a Permission model with a foreign key to ContentType; this lets Permission represent concepts like “can add blog entry” or “can delete news story”.
trans-unit.target: Django的多个捆绑应用程序都利用了后一种技术。例如，Django身份验证框架中 the permissions system 使用 Permission 模型，该模型带有 ContentType 的外键；这使 Permission 可以代表“可以添加博客条目”或“可以删除新闻故事”之类的概念。

trans-unit.source: Several other MySQLdb connection options may be useful, such as ssl, init_command, and sql_mode.
trans-unit.target: 其他几个MySQLdb连接选项可能有用，例如 ssl ， init_command 和 sql_mode 。

trans-unit.source: Several third-party Django tools and packages provide the ability to “minify” HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. They remove unnecessary whitespace, newlines, and comments, and shorten variable names, and thus reduce the size of the documents that your site publishes.
trans-unit.target: 一些第三方Django工具和软件包提供了“最小化” HTML，CSS和JavaScript的功能。它们删除了不必要的空格，换行符和注释，并缩短了变量名，从而减小了站点发布的文档的大小。

trans-unit.target: Shortcuts

trans-unit.source: Should be near the bottom as it’s a last-resort type of middleware.
trans-unit.target: 由于它是最后一种类型的中间件，应该在底部附近。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if adding an inline object is permitted, False otherwise. obj is the parent object being edited or None when adding a new parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许添加内联对象，则应返回 True ，否则返回 False 。 obj 是正在编辑的父对象，或者是添加新父对象时为 None 。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if adding an object is permitted, False otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许添加对象，则应返回 True ，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if deleting obj is permitted, False otherwise. If obj is None, should return True or False to indicate whether deleting objects of this type is permitted in general (e.g., False will be interpreted as meaning that the current user is not permitted to delete any object of this type).
trans-unit.target: 如果允许删除 obj ，则应返回 True ，否则返回 False 。如果 obj 为 None ，则应返回 True 或 False 以指示通常是否允许删除此类型的对象（例如， False 将解释为意味着不允许当前用户删除此类型的任何对象）。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if deleting an inline object is permitted, False otherwise. obj is the parent object being edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许删除内联对象，则应返回 True ，否则返回 False 。 obj 是正在编辑的父对象。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if displaying the module on the admin index page and accessing the module’s index page is permitted, False otherwise. Uses User.has_module_perms() by default. Overriding it does not restrict access to the view, add, change, or delete views, has_view_permission(), has_add_permission(), has_change_permission(), and has_delete_permission() should be used for that.
trans-unit.target: 如果在管理索引页面上显示模块并允许访问模块的索引页面，则应返回 True ,否则返回 False 。默认情况下使用 User.has_module_perms() 。覆盖它并不限制对视图的访问，添加，更改或删除视图， has_view_permission() 应使用has_view_permission（）， has_add_permission() ， has_change_permission() 和 has_delete_permission() 。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if editing obj is permitted, False otherwise. If obj is None, should return True or False to indicate whether editing of objects of this type is permitted in general (e.g., False will be interpreted as meaning that the current user is not permitted to edit any object of this type).
trans-unit.target: 如果允许编辑 obj ，则应返回 True ，否则返回 False 。如果 obj 为 None ，则应返回 True 或 False 以指示通常是否允许编辑此类型的对象（例如， False 将解释为意味着不允许当前用户编辑此类型的任何对象）。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if editing an inline object is permitted, False otherwise. obj is the parent object being edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许编辑内联对象，则应返回 True ，否则返回 False 。 obj 是正在编辑的父对象。

trans-unit.source: Should return True if viewing obj is permitted, False otherwise. If obj is None, should return True or False to indicate whether viewing of objects of this type is permitted in general (e.g., False will be interpreted as meaning that the current user is not permitted to view any object of this type).
trans-unit.target: 如果允许查看 obj ，则应返回 True ，否则返回 False 。如果obj为 None ，则应返回 True 或 False 以指示通常是否允许查看此类型的对象（例如， False 将解释为意味着不允许当前用户查看此类型的任何对象）。

trans-unit.source: Should return the actual name of name of the file saved (usually the name passed in, but if the storage needs to change the file name return the new name instead).
trans-unit.target: 应该返回保存的文件名的实际名称（通常是传入的 name ，但是如果存储需要更改文件名，则返回新名称）。

trans-unit.source: Shows all migrations in a project. You can choose from one of two formats:
trans-unit.target: 显示一个项目中的所有迁移。你可以从两种格式中选择一种。

trans-unit.source: Shows the migration operations that will be performed for the given migrate command.
trans-unit.target: 可见，将针对给定执行的迁移操作 migrate 命令。

trans-unit.source: Shows the migration plan Django will follow to apply migrations. Like --list, applied migrations are marked by an [X]. For a --verbosity of 2 and above, all dependencies of a migration will also be shown.
trans-unit.target: 显示Django将遵循的迁移计划以应用迁移。与 --list 类似，已应用的迁移由 [X] 标记。如果 --verbosity 为2或更高，还将显示迁移的所有依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Shows what migrations would be made without actually writing any migrations files to disk. Using this option along with --verbosity 3 will also show the complete migrations files that would be written.
trans-unit.target: 显示在不实际将任何迁移文件写入磁盘的情况下进行的迁移。将此选项与 --verbosity 3 一起使用还将显示将要写入的完整迁移文件。

trans-unit.target: 由于在刷新数据库后未发出 post_migrate ，因此 TransactionTestCase 之后的状态与 TestCase 之后的状态不同：它缺少由侦听器创建的行来 post_migrate 。考虑到执行测试的顺序，这不是问题，只要给定测试套件中的所有 TransactionTestCase 都声明 available_apps 或都不声明。

trans-unit.source: Since pickle compatibility errors can be difficult to diagnose, such as silently corrupted objects, a RuntimeWarning is raised when you try to unpickle a queryset in a Django version that is different than the one in which it was pickled.

trans-unit.source: Since static files might reference other static files that need to have their paths replaced, multiple passes of replacing paths may be needed until the file hashes converge. To prevent an infinite loop due to hashes not converging (for example, if 'foo.css' references 'bar.css' which references 'foo.css') there is a maximum number of passes before post-processing is abandoned. In cases with a large number of references, a higher number of passes might be needed. Increase the maximum number of passes by subclassing ManifestStaticFilesStorage and setting the max_post_process_passes attribute. It defaults to 5.
trans-unit.target: 由于静态文件可能引用其他需要替换其路径的静态文件，因此可能需要多次替换路径，直到文件散列收敛为止。为了防止由于哈希不收敛而导致的无限循环（例如，如果 'foo.css' 引用了 'bar.css' 引用了 'foo.css' ），则在放弃后处理之前必须经过最大次数。在具有大量参考的情况下，可能需要更多的通过次数。通过子类化 ManifestStaticFilesStorage 并设置 max_post_process_passes 属性来增加最大通过次数。默认为5。

trans-unit.source: Since the template language doesn’t provide exception handling, any exception raised from a template filter will be exposed as a server error. trans-unit.source: Some Field classes have required arguments. CharField, for example, requires that you give it a max_length. That’s used not only in the database schema, but in validation, as we’ll soon see.
trans-unit.target: 一些 Field 类具有必需的参数。例如， CharField 要求您给它一个 max_length 。我们将很快看到，它不仅用于数据库模式，还用于验证。

trans-unit.source: Some django.contrib applications take advantage of the sites framework but are architected in a way that doesn’t require the sites framework to be installed in your database. (Some people don’t want to, or just aren’t able to install the extra database table that the sites framework requires.) For those cases, the framework provides a django.contrib.sites.requests.RequestSite class, which can be used as a fallback when the database-backed sites framework is not available.
trans-unit.target: 一些django.contrib应用程序利用了站点框架的优势，但是其架构方式不需要在数据库中安装站点框架。（有些人不希望或者无法安装站点框架所需的额外数据库表。）在这种情况下，框架提供了 django.contrib.sites.requests.RequestSite 类，该类可以是当数据库支持的站点框架不可用时用作备用。

trans-unit.source: Some Django templates context processors return a fixed value. For Jinja2 templates, this layer of indirection isn’t necessary since you can add constants directly in jinja2.Environment.
trans-unit.target: 一些Django模板上下文处理器返回固定值。对于Jinja2模板，不需要此间接层，因为您可以直接在 jinja2.Environment 中添加常量。

trans-unit.source: Some Python libraries are also implemented in C, and can be much faster. They aim to offer the same APIs. Note that compatibility issues and behavior differences are not unknown (and not always immediately evident).
trans-unit.target: 一些Python库也是用C语言实现的,而且可以更快。它们的目标是提供相同的API。需要注意的是,兼容性问题和行为差异并不是未知的(而且并不总是立竿见影的)。

trans-unit.source: Some attributes won’t make sense to include in the Meta class of an abstract base class. For example, including db_table would mean that all the child classes (the ones that don’t specify their own Meta) would use the same database table, which is almost certainly not what you want.
trans-unit.target: 某些属性没有必要包含在抽象基类的Meta类中。例如，包含 db_table 意味着所有子类（未指定自己的Meta的子类）将使用相同的数据库表，几乎可以肯定这不是您想要的。

trans-unit.source: Some browsers (Chrome, for example) provide settings that allow users to continue browsing sessions after closing and re-opening the browser. In some cases, this can interfere with the SESSION_EXPIRE_AT_BROWSER_CLOSE setting and prevent sessions from expiring on browser close. Please be aware of this while testing Django applications which have the SESSION_EXPIRE_AT_BROWSER_CLOSE setting enabled.
trans-unit.target: 某些浏览器（例如Chrome）提供的设置可让用户在关闭并重新打开浏览器后继续浏览会话。在某些情况下，这可能会干扰 SESSION_EXPIRE_AT_BROWSER_CLOSE 设置并阻止会话在浏览器关闭时过期。在测试启用了 SESSION_EXPIRE_AT_BROWSER_CLOSE 设置的Django应用程序时，请注意这一点。

trans-unit.source: Some browsers (specifically Internet Explorer) can disallow the use of persistent cookies or can have the indexes to the cookie jar corrupted on disk, thereby causing CSRF protection checks to (sometimes intermittently) fail. Change this setting to None to use session-based CSRF cookies, which keep the cookies in-memory instead of on persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: 某些浏览器（特别是Internet Explorer）可能不允许使用持久性cookie，或者可能会破坏磁盘上cookie罐的索引，从而导致CSRF保护检查（有时是间歇性地）失败。将此设置更改为“ None 以使用基于会话的CSRF cookie，该cookie将cookie保留在内存中而不是持久存储中。

trans-unit.source: Some browsers have the ability to accept hints about whether they should send the HTTP Referer header when a user clicks a link; this hint is provided via the Referrer-Policy header. This header can suggest any of three behaviors to browsers:
trans-unit.target: 某些浏览器能够接受有关在用户单击链接时是否应发送HTTP Referer 标头的提示。此提示是通过Referrer-Policy标头提供的。此标头可以向浏览器建议以下三种行为中的任何一种：

trans-unit.source: Some browsers have the ability to block content that appears to be an XSS attack. They work by looking for JavaScript content in the GET or POST parameters of a page. If the JavaScript is replayed in the server’s response, the page is blocked from rendering and an error page is shown instead.
trans-unit.target: 某些浏览器能够阻止看似XSS攻击的内容。它们通过在页面的GET或POST参数中查找JavaScript内容来工作。如果在服务器的响应中重播了JavaScript，则该页面将无法呈现，而是显示错误页面。

trans-unit.source: Some browsers will try to guess the content types of the assets that they fetch, overriding the Content-Type header. While this can help display sites with improperly configured servers, it can also pose a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 一些浏览器会尝试猜测它们获取的资产的内容类型，从而覆盖 Content-Type 标头。尽管这可以帮助显示服务器配置不正确的站点，但也可能带来安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Some checks may be registered with multiple tags.
trans-unit.target: 有些支票可能有多个标签登记。

trans-unit.source: Some command options have different names when using call_command() instead of django-admin or manage.py. For example, django-admin createsuperuser --no-input translates to call_command('createsuperuser', interactive=False). To find what keyword argument name to use for call_command(), check the command’s source code for the dest argument passed to parser.add_argument().
trans-unit.target: 使用 call_command() 而不是 django-admin 或 manage.py 时，某些命令选项的名称不同。例如， django-admin createsuperuser --no-input 转换为 call_command('createsuperuser', interactive=False) 。要查找用于 call_command() 的关键字参数名称，请检查命令的源代码以了解传递给 parser.add_argument() 的 dest 参数。

trans-unit.source: Some commands are only available when the django.contrib application that implements them has been enabled. This section describes them grouped by their application.
trans-unit.target: 某些命令仅在 enabled 实现它们的 django.contrib 应用程序时可用。本节介绍了按应用程序分组的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Some data types (for example, dates) need to be in a specific format before they can be used by a database backend. get_db_prep_value() is the method where those conversions should be made. The specific connection that will be used for the query is passed as the connection parameter. This allows you to use backend-specific conversion logic if it is required.
trans-unit.target: 某些数据类型（例如，日期）必须采用特定的格式，然后数据库后端才能使用它们。 get_db_prep_value() 是进行这些转换的方法。将用于查询的特定连接作为 connection 参数传递。如果需要，这使您可以使用特定于后端的转换逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Some database column types accept parameters, such as CHAR(25), where the parameter 25 represents the maximum column length. In cases like these, it’s more flexible if the parameter is specified in the model rather than being hard-coded in the db_type() method. For example, it wouldn’t make much sense to have a CharMaxlength25Field, shown here:

trans-unit.source: Some databases may handle a nonexistent nth-value differently. For example, Oracle returns an empty string rather than None for character-based expressions. Django doesn’t do any conversions in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 某些数据库可能会以不同的方式处理不存在的nth值。例如，对于基于字符的表达式，Oracle返回一个空字符串而不是 None 。在这些情况下，Django不会进行任何转换。

trans-unit.source: Some developers like to make available both Atom and RSS versions of their feeds. To do that, you can create a subclass of your Feed class and set the feed_type to something different. Then update your URLconf to add the extra versions.
trans-unit.target: 一些开发人员喜欢同时提供其提要的Atom 和 RSS版本。为此，您可以创建 Feed 类的子类，并将 feed_type 设置为其他内容。然后更新您的URLconf以添加其他版本。

trans-unit.source: Some field types need some extra handling. For example, files that are uploaded using a form need to be handled differently (they can be retrieved from request.FILES, rather than request.POST). For details of how to handle file uploads with your form, see Binding uploaded files to a form.
trans-unit.target: 一些字段类型需要一些额外的处理。例如，使用表单上传的文件需要进行不同的处理（可以从 request.FILES 而不是 request.POST 检索它们）。有关如何使用表单处理文件上传的详细信息，请参阅将上传的文件绑定到表单。

trans-unit.source: Some fields define extra attributes on the model, e.g. a ForeignKey defines an extra attribute with _id appended to the field name, as well as related_name and related_query_name on the foreign model.
trans-unit.target: 一些字段在模型上定义了额外的属性，例如， ForeignKey 定义了在字段名称后附加 _id 以及在外部模型上的 related_name 和 related_query_name 的额外属性。

trans-unit.source: Some fields in a model won’t be deferred, even if you ask for them. You can never defer the loading of the primary key. If you are using select_related() to retrieve related models, you shouldn’t defer the loading of the field that connects from the primary model to the related one, doing so will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 即使您要求，模型中的某些字段也不会被延迟。您永远都不能推迟主键的加载。如果使用 select_related() 来检索相关模型，则不应推迟从主模型连接到相关模型的字段的加载，否则将导致错误。

trans-unit.target: 有关可用参数的一些信息可以在缓存参数文档中找到。有关更多信息，请查阅后端模块自己的文档。

trans-unit.source: Some kinds of projects may have authentication requirements for which Django’s built-in User model is not always appropriate. For instance, on some sites it makes more sense to use an email address as your identification token instead of a username.
trans-unit.target: 某些项目可能具有身份验证要求，而Django的内置 User 模型并不总是适用于此。例如，在某些站点上，使用电子邮件地址代替您的用户名作为您的识别令牌更有意义。

trans-unit.source: Some locales use context-sensitive formats for numbers, which Django’s localization system cannot handle automatically.
trans-unit.target: 某些语言环境使用数字的上下文相关格式，而Django的本地化系统无法自动处理。

trans-unit.source: Some locales use non-uniform digit grouping, e.g. 10,00,00,000 in en_IN. For this case, you can provide a sequence with the number of digit group sizes to be applied. The first number defines the size of the group preceding the decimal delimiter, and each number that follows defines the size of preceding groups. If the sequence is terminated with -1, no further grouping is performed. If the sequence terminates with a 0, the last group size is used for the remainder of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一些语言环境使用非均匀数字分组，例如 10,00,00,000 在 en_IN 。对于这种情况，您可以提供一个序列，其中包含要应用的数字组大小。第一个数字定义了十进制定界符前面的组的大小，随后的每个数字定义了前面组的大小。如果序列以 -1 终止，则不会执行进一步的分组。如果序列以 0 结尾，则最后一个组大小将用于数字的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Some of the admin templates, such as change_list_results.html are used to render custom inclusion tags. These may be overridden, but in such cases you are probably better off creating your own version of the tag in question and giving it a different name. That way you can use it selectively.
trans-unit.target: 一些管理模板（例如 change_list_results.html )用于呈现自定义包含标签。这些标签可能会被覆盖，但是在这种情况下，最好创建自己的相关标签版本并为其指定一个不同的名称。这样，您可以有选择地使用它。

trans-unit.source: Some of these checks may not be appropriate for your particular deployment configuration. For instance, if you do your HTTP to HTTPS redirection in a load balancer, it’d be irritating to be constantly warned about not having enabled SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT. Use SILENCED_SYSTEM_CHECKS to silence unneeded checks.
trans-unit.target: 其中某些检查可能不适用于您的特定部署配置。例如，如果您在负载均衡器中执行HTTP到HTTPS重定向，那么不断地被警告不要启用 SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT 会很烦人。使用 SILENCED_SYSTEM_CHECKS 使不需要的检查静音。

trans-unit.source: Some of these form interface elements - text input or checkboxes - are built into HTML itself. Others are much more complex; an interface that pops up a date picker or allows you to move a slider or manipulate controls will typically use JavaScript and CSS as well as HTML form <input> elements to achieve these effects.
trans-unit.target: 其中一些表单界面元素（文本输入或复选框）内置在HTML本身中。其他则复杂得多。弹出日期选择器或允许您移动滑块或操纵控件的界面通常将使用JavaScript和CSS以及HTML表单 <input> 元素来实现这些效果。

Here are the template loaders that come with Django:

trans-unit.source: Some operations – such as caching – cannot be performed on an unrendered template. They must be performed on a fully complete and rendered response.
trans-unit.target: 某些操作（例如缓存）无法在未渲染的模板上执行。它们必须在完全完整的渲染响应中执行。

trans-unit.source: Some possible workarounds for this are documented at sqlite.org, but they aren’t utilized by the default SQLite backend in Django, as incorporating them would be fairly difficult to do robustly. Thus, Django exposes the default SQLite behavior and you should be aware of this when doing case-insensitive or substring filtering.
trans-unit.target: 在sqlite.org上记录了一些可能的解决方法，但是Django中的默认SQLite后端没有使用这些方法，因为将它们合并起来相当困难。因此，Django公开了默认的SQLite行为，在进行不区分大小写或子字符串过滤时，您应该意识到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Some programmers follow a discipline called “test-driven development”; they actually write their tests before they write their code. This might seem counter-intuitive, but in fact it’s similar to what most people will often do anyway: they describe a problem, then create some code to solve it. Test-driven development formalizes the problem in a Python test case.
trans-unit.target: 一些程序员遵循一种称为“ 测试驱动的开发 ” 的准则。他们实际上在编写代码之前就编写了测试。这似乎违反直觉，但实际上它与大多数人经常要做的事情相似：他们描述一个问题，然后创建一些代码来解决它。测试驱动的开发将问题正式化为Python测试用例。

trans-unit.source: Some security audit tools flag this as a problem but as mentioned before, an attacker cannot steal a user’s browser’s CSRF cookie. “Stealing” or modifying your own token using Firebug, Chrome dev tools, etc. isn’t a vulnerability.
trans-unit.target: 一些安全审核工具将其标记为问题，但是如前所述，攻击者无法窃取用户浏览器的CSRF cookie。使用Firebug，Chrome开发工具等“隐藏”或修改自己的令牌不是漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Some shortcut methods provide a standard way to add messages with commonly used tags (which are usually represented as HTML classes for the message):
trans-unit.target: 一些快捷方法提供了一种标准的方法来添加带有常用标签的消息(这些标签通常表示为消息的HTML类)。

trans-unit.source: Some signals get sent many times, but you’ll only be interested in receiving a certain subset of those signals. For example, consider the django.db.models.signals.pre_save signal sent before a model gets saved. Most of the time, you don’t need to know when any model gets saved – just when one specific model is saved.
trans-unit.target: 有些信号被发送了很多次，但是您只对接收这些信号的某个子集感兴趣。例如，考虑在保存模型之前发送的 django.db.models.signals.pre_save 信号。大多数时候，您不需要知道何时保存任何模型，只需知道何时保存一个特定模型。

trans-unit.source: Some subclasses of File, including ContentFile and FieldFile, may replace this attribute with an object other than a Python file object. In these cases, this attribute may itself be a File subclass (and not necessarily the same subclass). Whenever possible, use the attributes and methods of the subclass itself rather than the those of the subclass’s file attribute.
trans-unit.target: File 的某些子类（包括 ContentFile 和 FieldFile ）可能会用Python 文件对象以外的对象替换此属性。在这些情况下，此属性本身可以是 File 子类（不一定是相同的子类）。尽可能使用子类本身的属性和方法，而不要使用子类的 file 属性的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: Some tags require beginning and ending tags (i.e. {% tag %} ... tag contents ... {% endtag %}).
trans-unit.target: 一些标签需要开始和结束标签（即 {% tag %} ... tag contents ... {% endtag %} ）。

trans-unit.source: Some tags require beginning and ending tags:
trans-unit.target: 有些标签需要开头和结尾标签。

trans-unit.source: Some technical notes:
trans-unit.target: 一些技术说明。

trans-unit.source: Some test suites also create views or materialized views; to run these, the user also needs CREATE VIEW WITH ADMIN OPTION and CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW WITH ADMIN OPTION privileges. In particular, this is needed for Django’s own test suite.
trans-unit.target: 一些测试套件还会创建视图或实例化视图。运行这些，用户还需要 CREATE VIEW WITH ADMIN OPTION 和 CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW WITH ADMIN OPTION 特权。特别是Django自己的测试套件需要此功能。

trans-unit.source: Some things to note:
trans-unit.target: 一些需要注意的事情。

trans-unit.source: Some useful assertions like:
trans-unit.target: 一些有用的论断,如:

trans-unit.source: Some widgets add further information to the context. For instance, all widgets that subclass Input defines widget['type'] and MultiWidget defines widget['subwidgets'] for looping purposes.
trans-unit.target: 一些小部件将更多信息添加到上下文中。例如，子类 Input 的所有小部件都定义了 widget['type'] 而 MultiWidget 定义了 widget['subwidgets'] subwidgets ']来实现循环。

trans-unit.source: Some work in optimization involves tackling performance shortcomings, but some of the work can be built-in to what you’d do anyway, as part of the good practices you should adopt even before you start thinking about improving performance.
trans-unit.target: 优化方面的某些工作涉及解决性能缺陷，但是某些工作也可以内置到您要做的事情中，这是您甚至在开始考虑提高性能之前就应该采用的良好实践的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes (in fact, quite often) you can create functions to rapidly compute the ETag value or the last-modified time for a resource, without needing to do all the computations needed to construct the full view. Django can then use these functions to provide an “early bailout” option for the view processing. Telling the client that the content has not been modified since the last request, perhaps.
trans-unit.target: 有时（实际上，经常），您可以创建函数来快速计算资源的ETag值或上次修改时间，而无需执行构造完整视图所需的所有计算。然后，Django可以使用这些功能为视图处理提供“早期救援”选项。告诉客户，自上次请求以来，该内容尚未修改。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a database won’t be accessed by the majority of your views, for example because it’s the database of an external system, or thanks to caching. In such cases, you should set CONN_MAX_AGE to a low value or even 0, because it doesn’t make sense to maintain a connection that’s unlikely to be reused. This will help keep the number of simultaneous connections to this database small.
trans-unit.target: 有时，大多数视图将无法访问数据库，例如，因为它是外部系统的数据库，或者是由于缓存。在这种情况下，应将 CONN_MAX_AGE 设置为一个较低的值，甚至设置为 0 ，因为维持一个不太可能被重用的连接没有意义。这将有助于减少与此数据库同时连接的数量。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes database expressions can’t easily express a complex WHERE clause. In these edge cases, use the RawSQL expression. For example:
trans-unit.target: 有时数据库表达式无法轻松地表达复杂的 WHERE 子句。在这些 RawSQL 情况下，请使用RawSQL表达式。例如：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes different database vendors require different SQL for the same operation. For this example we will rewrite a custom implementation for MySQL for the NotEqual operator. Instead of <> we will be using != operator. (Note that in reality almost all databases support both, including all the official databases supported by Django).
trans-unit.target: 有时，不同的数据库供应商对于同一操作需要不同的SQL。对于此示例，我们将为NotEqual运算符重写MySQL的自定义实现。代替 <> ,我们将使用 != 运算符。（请注意，实际上几乎所有数据库都支持这两种数据库，包括Django支持的所有官方数据库）。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes even Manager.raw() isn’t quite enough: you might need to perform queries that don’t map cleanly to models, or directly execute UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE queries.
trans-unit.target: 有时甚至 Manager.raw() 都不足够：您可能需要执行无法清晰映射到模型的查询，或者直接执行 UPDATE ， INSERT 或 DELETE 查询。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it may seem a chore to tear yourself away from your productive, creative programming work to face the unglamorous and unexciting business of writing tests, particularly when you know your code is working properly.
trans-unit.target: 有时,要把自己从富有成效、富有创意的编程工作中抽离出来,去面对编写测试这项不光彩、不刺激的工作,似乎是一件苦差事,尤其是当你知道自己的代码工作正常的时候。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it’s difficult to figure out where to get started with writing tests. If you have written several thousand lines of Python, choosing something to test might not be easy. In such a case, it’s fruitful to write your first test the next time you make a change, either when you add a new feature or fix a bug.
trans-unit.target: 有时很难弄清楚从哪里开始编写测试。如果您已经编写了数千行Python，那么选择要测试的东西可能并不容易。在这种情况下，当您添加新功能或修复错误时，下次进行更改时编写第一个测试会很有成果。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes particular views require different upload behavior. In these cases, you can override upload handlers on a per-request basis by modifying request.upload_handlers. By default, this list will contain the upload handlers given by FILE_UPLOAD_HANDLERS, but you can modify the list as you would any other list.
trans-unit.target: 有时特定的视图需要不同的上传行为。在这些情况下，您可以通过修改 request.upload_handlers 来按请求覆盖上传处理程序。默认情况下，此列表将包含 FILE_UPLOAD_HANDLERS 给出的上载处理程序，但是您可以像其他任何列表一样修改该列表。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes tests will need to be updated. Suppose that we amend our views so that only Questions with Choices are published. In that case, many of our existing tests will fail - telling us exactly which tests need to be amended to bring them up to date, so to that extent tests help look after themselves.
trans-unit.target: 有时需要更新测试。假设我们修改了观点，以便仅发布带有 Choices Questions 。在这种情况下，我们现有的许多测试都将失败- 告诉我们确切需要修改哪些测试以使它们保持最新状态，因此在某种程度上，测试有助于自己进行自我照顾。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the basic features for custom template tag creation aren’t enough. Don’t worry, Django gives you complete access to the internals required to build a template tag from the ground up.
trans-unit.target: 有时，自定义模板标签创建的基本功能还不够。不用担心，Django使您可以完全访问从头开始构建模板标签所需的内部组件。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes when you use natural foreign keys you’ll need to deserialize data where an object has a foreign key referencing another object that hasn’t yet been deserialized. This is called a “forward reference”.
trans-unit.target: 有时，当您使用自然外键时，您需要对一个对象具有一个外键引用另一个尚未反序列化的对象的对象进行反序列化数据。这称为“前向参考”。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes with multi-table inheritance you may want to delete only a child model’s data. Specifying keep_parents=True will keep the parent model’s data.
trans-unit.target: 有时，通过多表继承，您可能只想删除子模型的数据。指定 keep_parents=True 将保留父模型的数据。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes words have several meanings, such as "May" in English, which refers to a month name and to a verb. To enable translators to translate these words correctly in different contexts, you can use the django.utils.translation.pgettext() function, or the django.utils.translation.npgettext() function if the string needs pluralization. Both take a context string as the first variable.
trans-unit.target: 有时单词有多种含义，例如英语中的 "May" ，它表示月份名称和动词。为了使翻译这些词在不同环境下正确转换，你可以使用 django.utils.translation.pgettext() 函数，或 django.utils.translation.npgettext() 如果字符串需要多元化的功能。两者都将上下文字符串作为第一个变量。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you might want to cache multiple copies of a fragment depending on some dynamic data that appears inside the fragment. For example, you might want a separate cached copy of the sidebar used in the previous example for every user of your site. Do this by passing one or more additional arguments, which may be variables with or without filters, to the {% cache %} template tag to uniquely identify the cache fragment:
trans-unit.target: 有时，您可能想缓存片段的多个副本，具体取决于片段内显示的一些动态数据。例如，您可能想要为站点中的每个用户提供上一个示例中使用的侧边栏的单独的缓存副本。为此，请将一个或多个其他参数（可能是带或不带过滤器的变量）传递到 {% cache %} 模板标签，以唯一地标识缓存片段：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to disable certain actions – especially those registered site-wide – for particular objects. There’s a few ways you can disable actions:
trans-unit.target: 有时，您需要针对特定对象禁用某些操作，尤其是那些在站点范围内注册的操作。您可以通过以下几种方法来禁用操作：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to perform an action related to the current database transaction, but only if the transaction successfully commits. Examples might include a Celery task, an email notification, or a cache invalidation.
trans-unit.target: 有时您需要执行与当前数据库事务相关的操作，但前提是该事务成功提交。示例可能包括Celery任务，电子邮件通知或缓存无效。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to perform an action related to the current database transaction, but only if the transaction successfully commits. Examples might include a Celery task, an email notification, or a cache invalidation.
trans-unit.target: 有时您需要执行与当前数据库事务相关的操作，但前提是该事务成功提交。示例可能包括Celery任务，电子邮件通知或缓存无效。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes your form class takes custom parameters, like MyArticleForm. You can pass this parameter when instantiating the formset:
trans-unit.target: 有时，您的表单类采用自定义参数，例如 MyArticleForm 。您可以在实例化表单集时传递此参数：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, caching an entire rendered page doesn’t gain you very much and is, in fact, inconvenient overkill.
trans-unit.target: 有时，缓存整个渲染的页面并不能带来太多好处，实际上，这是不方便的过大杀伤力。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, the Django query syntax by itself can’t easily express a complex WHERE clause. For these edge cases, Django provides the extra()QuerySet modifier — a hook for injecting specific clauses into the SQL generated by a QuerySet.
trans-unit.target: 有时，Django查询语法本身无法轻松表达复杂的 WHERE 子句。对于这些极端情况，Django提供了 extra() QuerySet 修饰符—一个钩子，用于将特定子句注入 QuerySet 生成的SQL中。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, you should use gettext_lazy() as the default translation method for a particular file. Without _() in the global namespace, the developer has to think about which is the most appropriate translation function.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您应该将 gettext_lazy() 用作特定文件的默认翻译方法。在全局名称空间中没有 _() 的情况下，开发人员必须考虑哪个是最合适的翻译功能。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, your inclusion tags might require a large number of arguments, making it a pain for template authors to pass in all the arguments and remember their order. To solve this, Django provides a takes_context option for inclusion tags. If you specify takes_context in creating a template tag, the tag will have no required arguments, and the underlying Python function will have one argument – the template context as of when the tag was called.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您的包含标签可能需要大量参数，这使模板作者难以传递所有参数并记住其顺序。为了解决这个问题，Django 为包含标记提供了 takes_context 选项。如果在创建模板标签时指定了 takes_context ，则标签将没有必需的参数，而底层的Python函数将只有一个参数-调用标签时的模板上下文。

trans-unit.source: Sorts test cases in the opposite execution order. This may help in debugging the side effects of tests that aren’t properly isolated. Grouping by test class is preserved when using this option.
trans-unit.target: 以相反的执行顺序对测试用例进行排序。这可能有助于调试未正确隔离的测试的副作用。使用此选项时，将保留按测试类分组。

trans-unit.source: Specification
trans-unit.target: Specification

trans-unit.source: Specifies a different port, or IP address and port, from the default of 127.0.0.1:8000. This value follows exactly the same format and serves exactly the same function as the argument to the runserver command.
trans-unit.target: 指定与默认值 127.0.0.1:8000 不同的端口或IP地址和端口。此值遵循与 runserver 命令的参数完全相同的格式，并具有与功能完全相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a directory, file path, or URL of a custom project template. See the startapp --template documentation for examples and usage.
trans-unit.target: 指定自定义项目模板的目录，文件路径或URL。有关示例和用法，请参阅 startapp --template 文档。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a file to write the serialized data to. By default, the data goes to standard output.
trans-unit.target: 指定要将序列化数据写入的文件。默认情况下,数据将被写入标准输出。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of file extensions to examine (default: html, txt, py or js if --domain is js).
trans-unit.target: 指定要检查的文件扩展名列表（默认值： html ， txt ， py 或 js ,如果 --domain 是 js ）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a single app to look for fixtures in rather than looking in all apps.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个单一的应用程序来寻找固定装置,而不是在所有的应用程序中寻找。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a timeout in seconds for blocking operations like the connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 指定阻止连接尝试等操作的超时时间,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the serialization format (e.g., json or xml) for fixtures read from stdin.
trans-unit.target: 指定从stdin读取的灯具的序列化格式（例如 json 或 xml ）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the renderer to use for the form. Defaults to None which means to use the default renderer specified by the FORM_RENDERER setting.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于表单的渲染器。默认为 None ，这意味着使用 FORM_RENDERER 设置指定的默认渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the GML version to use: 2 (default) or 3.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount of notification and debug information that a command should print to the console.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character set encoding of the strings in the OGR data source. For example, 'latin-1', 'utf-8', and 'cp437' are all valid encoding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指定OGR数据源中字符串的字符集编码。例如， 'latin-1' ， 'utf-8' 和 'cp437' 都是有效的编码参数。

trans-unit.source: Strictly speaking, filesizeformat does not conform to the International System of Units which recommends using KiB, MiB, GiB, etc. when byte sizes are calculated in powers of 1024 (which is the case here). Instead, Django uses traditional unit names (KB, MB, GB, etc.) corresponding to names that are more commonly used.
trans-unit.target: 严格来说，当字节大小以1024的幂进行计算时， filesizeformat 不符合建议使用KiB，MiB，GiB等的国际单位制（此处就是这种情况）。取而代之的是，Django使用与更常用的名称相对应的传统单位名称（KB，MB，GB等）。

trans-unit.source: Subdomains within a site are able to set cookies on the client for the whole domain. This makes session fixation possible if cookies are permitted from subdomains not controlled by trusted users.
trans-unit.target: 一个网站内的子域能够为整个域在客户端上设置cookies。如果不受信任的用户控制的子域允许cookies,这使得会话固定成为可能。

trans-unit.source: Subdomains within a site will be able to set cookies on the client for the whole domain. By setting the cookie and using a corresponding token, subdomains will be able to circumvent the CSRF protection. The only way to avoid this is to ensure that subdomains are controlled by trusted users (or, are at least unable to set cookies). Note that even without CSRF, there are other vulnerabilities, such as session fixation, that make giving subdomains to untrusted parties a bad idea, and these vulnerabilities cannot easily be fixed with current browsers.
trans-unit.target: 一个网站内的子域将能够在客户端设置整个域的cookie。通过设置cookie并使用相应的令牌,子域将能够规避CSRF保护。避免这种情况的唯一方法是确保子域由受信任的用户控制(或者,至少无法设置cookie)。需要注意的是,即使没有CSRF,也存在其他漏洞,比如会话固定,将子域交给不受信任的一方是个坏主意,而这些漏洞在目前的浏览器上是不容易修复的。

trans-unit.source: Suppose an online store has a page where a logged in user can click “Buy Now” to purchase an item. A user has chosen to stay logged into the store all the time for convenience. An attacker site might create an “I Like Ponies” button on one of their own pages, and load the store’s page in a transparent iframe such that the “Buy Now” button is invisibly overlaid on the “I Like Ponies” button. If the user visits the attacker’s site, clicking “I Like Ponies” will cause an inadvertent click on the “Buy Now” button and an unknowing purchase of the item.
trans-unit.target: 假设在线商店有一个页面，登录的用户可以在该页面上单击“立即购买”来购买商品。为了方便起见，用户选择一直保持登录状态。攻击者站点可能会在自己的一个页面上创建一个“我喜欢小马”按钮，然后将商店的页面加载到透明的iframe中，从而使“立即购买”按钮以不可见的方式覆盖在“我喜欢小马”按钮上。如果用户访问攻击者的网站，则单击“我喜欢小马”会导致无意间单击“立即购买”按钮，并且在不知情的情况下购买了该物品。

trans-unit.source: Suppose somebody wants to access our book library over HTTP using the views as an API. The API client would connect every now and then and download book data for the books published since last visit. But if no new books appeared since then, it is a waste of CPU time and bandwidth to fetch the books from the database, render a full response and send it to the client. It might be preferable to ask the API when the most recent book was published.
trans-unit.target: 假设有人想通过HTTP使用视图作为API访问我们的书库。API客户端每隔一段时间就会连接一次,并下载上次访问后出版的书籍数据。但如果从那时起就没有新书出现,那么从数据库中获取书籍,呈现完整的响应并将其发送给客户端,是一种CPU时间和带宽的浪费。最好的办法可能是询问API最近的书是什么时候出版的。

trans-unit.source: Suppose there is only one blog that had both entries containing “Lennon” and entries from 2008, but that none of the entries from 2008 contained “Lennon”. The first query would not return any blogs, but the second query would return that one blog.
trans-unit.target: 假设只有一个博客既包含“ Lennon”条目又包含2008年的条目，但是2008年的任何条目都不包含“ Lennon”。第一个查询将不返回任何博客，但是第二个查询将返回该博客。

trans-unit.source: Suppose we add another requirement to our contact form: if the cc_myself field is True, the subject must contain the word "help". We are performing validation on more than one field at a time, so the form’s clean() method is a good spot to do this. Notice that we are talking about the clean() method on the form here, whereas earlier we were writing a clean() method on a field. It’s important to keep the field and form difference clear when working out where to validate things. Fields are single data points, forms are a collection of fields.
trans-unit.target: 假设我们在联系表单中添加了另一个要求：如果 cc_myself 字段为 True ，则 subject 必须包含单词 "help" 。我们一次要在多个字段上执行验证，因此表单的 clean() 方法是执行此操作的好地方。注意，这里我们在表单上谈论的是 clean() 方法，而之前我们在字段上编写了一个 clean() 方法。在确定要验证的地方时，务必保持字段和形式上的差异清晰。字段是单个数据点，表单是字段的集合。

trans-unit.source: Tags are more complex than filters, because tags can do anything. Django provides a number of shortcuts that make writing most types of tags easier. First we’ll explore those shortcuts, then explain how to write a tag from scratch for those cases when the shortcuts aren’t powerful enough.
trans-unit.target: 标签比过滤器更复杂，因为标签可以执行任何操作。Django提供了许多快捷方式，使编写大多数类型的标签变得更加容易。首先，我们将探索这些快捷方式，然后说明在快捷方式功能不足时如何从头开始编写标签。

trans-unit.source: Tags look like this: {% tag %}. Tags are more complex than variables: Some create text in the output, some control flow by performing loops or logic, and some load external information into the template to be used by later variables.
trans-unit.target: 标签看起来像这样： {% tag %} 。标签比变量更复杂：一些变量在输出中创建文本，一些变量通过执行循环或逻辑来控制流，某些变量将外部信息加载到模板中，以供以后的变量使用。

trans-unit.source: Tags provide arbitrary logic in the rendering process.

trans-unit.source: Takes a list of field values (id_list) and the field_name for those values, and returns a dictionary mapping each value to an instance of the object with the given field value. If id_list isn’t provided, all objects in the queryset are returned. field_name must be a unique field, and it defaults to the primary key.
trans-unit.target: 获取字段值的列表（ id_list ）和这些值的 field_name ，并返回将每个值映射到具有给定字段值的对象实例的字典。如果未提供 id_list ，则返回queryset中的所有对象。 field_name 必须是唯一字段，并且默认为主键。

trans-unit.source: Takes a list of valid values and returns a “compressed” version of those values – in a single value. For example, SplitDateTimeField is a subclass which combines a time field and a date field into a datetime object.
trans-unit.target: 获取有效值列表，并在单个值中返回这些值的“压缩”版本。例如， SplitDateTimeField 是将时间字段和日期字段组合到 datetime 对象中的子类。

trans-unit.source: Takes a raw SQL query, executes it, and returns a django.db.models.query.RawQuerySet instance. This RawQuerySet instance can be iterated over just like a normal QuerySet to provide object instances.
trans-unit.target: 进行原始SQL查询，执行该查询，并返回 django.db.models.query.RawQuerySet 实例。可以像普通 QuerySet 一样迭代此 RawQuerySet 实例以提供对象实例。

trans-unit.source: Takes a set of valid lookup arguments for the model the ContentType represents, and does a get() lookup on that model, returning the corresponding object.

trans-unit.source: Takes a single “compressed” value of a field, for example a DateRangeField, and returns a tuple representing a lower and upper bound.

trans-unit.source: Takes an expression representing a DateField, DateTimeField, TimeField, or DurationField and a lookup_name, and returns the part of the date referenced by lookup_name as an IntegerField. trans-unit.source: Taking a closer look at the implementation, the first required attribute is lookup_name. This allows the ORM to understand how to interpret name__ne and use NotEqual to generate the SQL. By convention, these names are always lowercase strings containing only letters, but the only hard requirement is that it must not contain the string __.
trans-unit.target: 仔细研究实现，第一个必需的属性是 lookup_name 。这使ORM能够理解如何解释 name__ne 并使用 NotEqual 生成SQL。按照惯例，这些名称始终是仅包含字母的小写字符串，但唯一的硬性要求是它不能包含字符串 __ 。

trans-unit.source: Technically, it isn’t correct to say that iri_to_uri() implements the full algorithm in the IRI specification. It doesn’t (yet) perform the international domain name encoding portion of the algorithm.

trans-unit.source: TemplateResponse provides a way to do just that. Unlike basic HttpResponse objects, TemplateResponse objects retain the details of the template and context that was provided by the view to compute the response. The final output of the response is not computed until it is needed, later in the response process.
trans-unit.target: TemplateResponse提供了一种做到这一点的方法。与基本 HttpResponse 对象不同，TemplateResponse对象保留视图提供的模板和上下文的详细信息，以计算响应。直到需要时才在响应过程的后期计算响应的最终输出。

trans-unit.source: Testing a Web application is a complex task, because a Web application is made of several layers of logic – from HTTP-level request handling, to form validation and processing, to template rendering. With Django’s test-execution framework and assorted utilities, you can simulate requests, insert test data, inspect your application’s output and generally verify your code is doing what it should be doing.
trans-unit.target: 测试Web应用程序是一项复杂的任务，因为Web应用程序由几层逻辑组成-从HTTP级别的请求处理到表单验证和处理，再到模板渲染。使用Django的测试执行框架和各种实用程序，您可以模拟请求，插入测试数据，检查应用程序的输出，并通常验证您的代码在执行应做的事情。

trans-unit.source: Testing operates at different levels. Some tests might apply to a tiny detail (does a particular model method return values as expected?) while others examine the overall operation of the software (does a sequence of user inputs on the site produce the desired result?). That’s no different from the kind of testing you did earlier in Tutorial 2, using the shell to examine the behavior of a method, or running the application and entering data to check how it behaves.
trans-unit.target: 测试在不同级别进行。有些测试可能只适用于一个很小的细节（特定的模型方法是否按预期返回值？），而另一些测试则检查软件的整体操作（现场的一系列用户输入是否会产生所需的结果？）。这与您在教程2的前面进行的测试没有什么不同，使用 shell 来检查方法的行为，或者运行应用程序并输入数据来检查其行为，这与您在教程2中所做的测试没有什么不同。

trans-unit.source: Tests if no point in the geometry field is outside the lookup geometry. [3]
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段中是否没有点在查找几何之外。[3]

trans-unit.source: Tests if no point in the lookup geometry is outside the geometry field. [3]
trans-unit.target: 测试查找几何中是否没有点在几何字段之外。[3]

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field is “equal” to the lookup geometry. On Oracle, MySQL, and SpatiaLite, it tests spatial equality, while on PostGIS it tests equality of bounding boxes.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段是否与查找几何“相等”。在Oracle，MySQL和SpatiaLite上，它测试空间相等性，而在PostGIS上，它测试边界框的相等性。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field is spatially disjoint from the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段与查找几何字段是否在空间上不相干。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field is spatially equal to the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段是否与查找的几何字段在空间上相等。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field is spatially related to the lookup geometry by the values given in the given pattern. This lookup requires a tuple parameter, (geom, pattern); the form of pattern will depend on the spatial backend:
trans-unit.target: 通过给定模式中给出的值测试几何字段在空间上是否与查找几何相关。这个查询需要一个元组参数， (geom, pattern) ； pattern 的形式将取决于空间后端：

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field is spatially within the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段是否在空间上属于查找几何体。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field spatially contains the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段在空间上是否包含查找的几何体。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field spatially crosses the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段是否在空间上与查找的几何字段交叉。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field spatially intersects the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段是否在空间上与查找的几何体相交。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field spatially overlaps the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段是否在空间上与查找的几何字段重叠。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field spatially touches the lookup geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段是否在空间上触及到查找的几何体。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box is completely contained by the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否完全包含在查找几何的边界框内。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box is strictly above the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否严格位于查找几何的边界框上方。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box is strictly below the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否严格低于查找几何的边界框。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box is strictly to the left of the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否严格位于查找几何的边界框的左侧。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box is strictly to the right of the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否严格位于查找几何的边界框的右侧。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box overlaps or is above the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否重叠或在查找几何的边界框上方。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box overlaps or is below the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否重叠或在查找几何的边界框之下。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box overlaps or is to the left of the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否重叠或位于查找几何的边界框的左侧。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box overlaps or is to the right of the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否重叠或在查找几何的边界框的右侧。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry field’s bounding box overlaps the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何字段的边界框是否与查找几何的边界框重叠。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry is valid.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何体是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the geometry or raster field’s bounding box completely contains the lookup geometry’s bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 测试几何或栅格字段的边界框是否完全包含查找几何的边界框。

trans-unit.source: Tests make your code more attractive
trans-unit.target: 测试让你的代码更有吸引力

trans-unit.source: Tests that require a database (namely, model tests) will not use your “real” (production) database. Separate, blank databases are created for the tests.
trans-unit.target: 需要数据库的测试（即模型测试）将不会使用“实际”（生产）数据库。将为测试创建单独的空白数据库。

trans-unit.source: Tests will save you time
trans-unit.target: 测试将为您节省时间

trans-unit.source: That adds a search box at the top of the change list. When somebody enters search terms, Django will search the question_text field. You can use as many fields as you’d like – although because it uses a LIKE query behind the scenes, limiting the number of search fields to a reasonable number will make it easier for your database to do the search.
trans-unit.target: 这将在更改列表的顶部添加一个搜索框。当有人输入搜索词时，Django将搜索 question_text 字段。您可以使用任意多个字段-尽管由于它在后台使用 LIKE 查询，所以将搜索字段的数量限制为合理的数量将使数据库更易于搜索。

trans-unit.source: That in-memory structure is also used to work out what the differences are between your models and the current state of your migrations; Django runs through all the changes, in order, on an in-memory set of models to come up with the state of your models last time you ran makemigrations. It then uses these models to compare against the ones in your models.py files to work out what you have changed.
trans-unit.target: 该内存结构还用于确定模型与迁移当前状态之间的差异。Django会按顺序对所有内存模型进行所有更改，以在上一次运行 makemigrations 时得出模型的状态。然后，它将使用这些模型与 models.py 文件中的模型进行比较，以得出您所做的更改。

By default, this action would appear in the action list as “Make published” – the function name, with underscores replaced by spaces. That’s fine, but we can provide a better, more human-friendly name by giving the make_published function a short_description attribute:
trans-unit.target: 实际上，这就是编写动作的全部内容！但是，我们将采取另外一个可选但有用的步骤，并在管理员中为该操作指定一个“不错”的标题。默认情况下，此操作将在操作列表中显示为“发布”-函数名称，下划线用空格替换。很好，但是我们可以通过给 make_published 函数一个 short_description 属性来提供一个更好，更人性化的名称：

trans-unit.source: That’s all the Python code we need to write. We still need to write a template, however. We could explicitly tell the view which template to use by adding a template_name attribute to the view, but in the absence of an explicit template Django will infer one from the object’s name. In this case, the inferred template will be "books/publisher_list.html" – the “books” part comes from the name of the app that defines the model, while the “publisher” bit is the lowercased version of the model’s name.
trans-unit.target: 这就是我们需要编写的所有Python代码。但是，我们仍然需要编写一个模板。我们可以通过在视图中添加 template_name 属性来明确告诉视图要使用哪个模板，但是在没有显式模板的情况下，Django将从对象名称中推断出一个模板。在这种情况下，推断的模板将是 "books/publisher_list.html" –“ books”部分来自定义模型的应用程序的名称，而“ publisher”位则是模型名称的小写版本。

trans-unit.target: 真的就是全部。通用视图的所有很酷的功能都来自于更改通用视图上设置的属性。该通用视图引用文档中的所有详细的通用视图的选择; 本文档的其余部分将考虑您可以自定义和扩展通用视图的一些常用方法。

trans-unit.source: That’s the basic authentication backend that checks the Django users database and queries the built-in permissions. It does not provide protection against brute force attacks via any rate limiting mechanism. You may either implement your own rate limiting mechanism in a custom auth backend, or use the mechanisms provided by most Web servers.
trans-unit.target: 这是检查Django用户数据库并查询内置权限的基本身份验证后端。它不能通过任何速率限制机制提供针对暴力攻击的保护。您可以在自定义身份验证后端中实现自己的速率限制机制，也可以使用大多数Web服务器提供的机制。

trans-unit.source: That’s what django.contrib.staticfiles is for: it collects static files from each of your applications (and any other places you specify) into a single location that can easily be served in production.
trans-unit.target: 这就是 django.contrib.staticfiles 的用途：它将来自每个应用程序（以及您指定的任何其他位置）的静态文件收集到一个易于在生产中使用的位置。

trans-unit.source: That’s where caching comes in.

trans-unit.target: 电子邮件的“发件人：”标头将是 SERVER_EMAIL 设置的值。

trans-unit.source: The “delete selected objects” action uses QuerySet.delete() for efficiency reasons, which has an important caveat: your model’s delete() method will not be called.
trans-unit.target: 出于效率考虑，“删除选定对象”操作使用 QuerySet.delete() ，这有一个重要警告：不要调用模型的 delete() 方法。

trans-unit.source: The “initial migrations” for an app are the migrations that create the first version of that app’s tables. Usually an app will have one initial migration, but in some cases of complex model interdependencies it may have two or more.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的“初始迁移”是创建该应用程序表的第一个版本的迁移。通常，一个应用程序将进行一次初始迁移，但是在某些情况下，由于模型相互依存关系复杂，它可能会有两个或多个。

trans-unit.source: The “no data” value for a band is generally a special marker value used to mark pixels that are not valid data. Such pixels should generally not be displayed, nor contribute to analysis operations.
trans-unit.target: 波段的“无数据”值通常是用于标记不是有效数据的像素的特殊标记值。通常不应显示此类像素，也不应参与分析操作。

trans-unit.source: The “object_id” field doesn’t have to be the same type as the primary key fields on the related models, but their primary key values must be coercible to the same type as the “object_id” field by its get_db_prep_value() method.
trans-unit.target: “ object_id”字段不必与相关模型上的主键字段具有相同的类型，但通过其 get_db_prep_value() 方法，其主键值必须与“ object_id”字段具有相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The collectstatic management command calls the post_process() method of the STATICFILES_STORAGE after each run and passes a list of paths that have been found by the management command. trans-unit.source: The RedirectFallbackMiddleware does all of the work. Each time any Django application raises a 404 error, this middleware checks the redirects database for the requested URL as a last resort. Specifically, it checks for a redirect with the given old_path with a site ID that corresponds to the SITE_ID setting.
trans-unit.target: 该 RedirectFallbackMiddleware 完成所有的工作。每当任何Django应用程序引发404错误时，此中间件都会作为最后手段在重定向数据库中检查请求的URL。具体来说，它将使用给定的 old_path （其站点ID对应于 SITE_ID 设置）检查重定向。

trans-unit.source: The django.contrib.sitemaps.GenericSitemap class allows you to create a sitemap by passing it a dictionary which has to contain at least a queryset entry. This queryset will be used to generate the items of the sitemap. It may also have a date_field entry that specifies a date field for objects retrieved from the queryset. This will be used for the lastmod attribute in the generated sitemap.
trans-unit.target: 该 django.contrib.sitemaps.GenericSitemap 类可以通过将其具有包含至少一个字典来创建一个网站地图 queryset 条目。该查询集将用于生成站点地图的项目。它还可能具有 date_field 条目，该条目为从 queryset 检索的对象指定日期字段。这将用于生成的站点地图中的 lastmod 属性。

trans-unit.source: The ImproperlyConfigured exception is raised when Django is somehow improperly configured – for example, if a value in settings.py is incorrect or unparseable.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ImproperlyConfigured 引发异常时Django是不知何故不正确配置的-例如，如果在一个值 settings.py 不正确或不可解析。

trans-unit.source: The MiddlewareNotUsed exception is raised when a middleware is not used in the server configuration.

trans-unit.source: The MultipleObjectsReturned exception is raised by a query if only one object is expected, but multiple objects are returned. A base version of this exception is provided in django.core.exceptions; each model class contains a subclassed version that can be used to identify the specific object type that has returned multiple objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 MultipleObjectsReturned 异常由查询提出，如果只有一个对象的预期，但在返回多个对象。 django.core.exceptions 中提供了此异常的基本版本。每个模型类都包含一个子类版本，该子类版本可用于标识已返回多个对象的特定对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The PermissionDenied exception is raised when a user does not have permission to perform the action requested.
trans-unit.target: 该 PermissionDenied 当用户没有执行所请求的操作异常。

trans-unit.source: The RequestAborted exception is raised when a HTTP body being read in by the handler is cut off midstream and the client connection closes, or when the client does not send data and hits a timeout where the server closes the connection.
trans-unit.target: 该 RequestAborted 当由处理器读取一个HTTP身体被切断中游和客户端连接关闭，或当客户端不发送数据，并命中其中，服务器关闭连接超时异常。

trans-unit.target: 所述 SuspiciousOperation 当用户已经执行应被认为是可疑的从安全的角度，例如与会话cookie篡改的操作异常。 SuspiciousOperation 的子类包括：

trans-unit.source: The SynchronousOnlyOperation exception is raised when code that is only allowed in synchronous Python code is called from an asynchronous context (a thread with a running asynchronous event loop). These parts of Django are generally heavily reliant on thread-safety to function and don’t work correctly under coroutines sharing the same thread.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SynchronousOnlyOperation 时只允许在同步Python代码码从异步上下文（与正在运行的异步事件循环线程）被称为异常。Django的这些部分通常严重依赖线程安全性来起作用，并且在共享同一线程的协程下无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The ValidationError exception is raised when data fails form or model field validation. For more information about validation, see Form and Field Validation, Model Field Validation and the Validator Reference.
trans-unit.target: 该 ValidationError 当数据发生故障形式或模型字段验证异常。有关验证的更多信息，请参见表单和字段验证，模型字段验证和验证器参考。

trans-unit.source: The RequestFactory shares the same API as the test client. However, instead of behaving like a browser, the RequestFactory provides a way to generate a request instance that can be used as the first argument to any view. This means you can test a view function the same way as you would test any other function – as a black box, with exactly known inputs, testing for specific outputs.
trans-unit.target: 该 RequestFactory 共享相同的API测试客户端。但是，RequestFactory不能像浏览器那样运行，而是提供一种生成请求实例的方法，该实例可用作任何视图的第一个参数。这意味着您可以像测试任何其他功能一样测试视图函数–就像一个黑盒子，带有确切已知的输入，测试特定的输出。

trans-unit.source: The include tag should be considered as an implementation of “render this subtemplate and include the HTML”, not as “parse this subtemplate and include its contents as if it were part of the parent”. This means that there is no shared state between included templates – each include is a completely independent rendering process.
trans-unit.target: 在 include 标签应被视为“呈现此子模板，并包括HTML”，而不是“分析此子模板，包括它的内容就好像它是母公司的一部分”的实现。这意味着在包含的模板之间没有共享状态–每个包含都是一个完全独立的呈现过程。

trans-unit.source: The language tag expects the language code as the only argument.
trans-unit.target: 在 language 标记希望的语言代码作为唯一的参数。

trans-unit.source: The makemigrations command looks at all your available models and creates migrations for whichever tables don’t already exist. migrate runs the migrations and creates tables in your database, as well as optionally providing much richer schema control.
trans-unit.target: 该 makemigrations 命令会在所有可用的模型并创建哪个表不存在迁移。 migrate 运行迁移和在数据库中创建表，以及可选地提供更丰富的模式控制。

trans-unit.source: The migrate command looks at the INSTALLED_APPS setting and creates any necessary database tables according to the database settings in your mysite/settings.py file and the database migrations shipped with the app (we’ll cover those later). You’ll see a message for each migration it applies. If you’re interested, run the command-line client for your database and type \dt (PostgreSQL), SHOW TABLES; (MariaDB, MySQL), .schema (SQLite), or SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM USER_TABLES; (Oracle) to display the tables Django created.
trans-unit.target: 该 migrate 命令着眼于 INSTALLED_APPS 设置并创建根据您的数据库设置任何必要的数据库表 mysite/settings.py 文件，并随应用程序的数据库迁移（我们将讨论这些更高版本）。您将看到一条适用于每次迁移的消息。如果您有兴趣，请为数据库运行命令行客户端，然后键入 \dt （PostgreSQL）， SHOW TABLES; （MariaDB，MySQL） .schema （SQLite）或 SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM USER_TABLES; （Oracle）以显示Django创建的表。

trans-unit.source: The migrate command takes all the migrations that haven’t been applied (Django tracks which ones are applied using a special table in your database called django_migrations) and runs them against your database - essentially, synchronizing the changes you made to your models with the schema in the database.
trans-unit.target: 该 migrate 命令采取一切还没有被应用的迁移（这是使用数据库的特殊表称为应用于Django的那些曲目 django_migrations ）并运行他们对你的数据库-本质上，同步你的模型制作带有架构的变化在数据库中。

trans-unit.source: The sqlmigrate command doesn’t actually run the migration on your database - instead, it prints it to the screen so that you can see what SQL Django thinks is required. It’s useful for checking what Django is going to do or if you have database administrators who require SQL scripts for changes.
trans-unit.target: 该 sqlmigrate 命令实际上并不在数据库上运行迁移-相反，它是打印在屏幕上，这样就可以看到什么SQL Django的认为是必需的。这对于检查Django将要执行的操作或您是否具有需要SQL脚本进行更改的数据库管理员很有用。

trans-unit.source: The db_type() and rel_db_type() methods are called by Django when the framework constructs the CREATE TABLE statements for your application – that is, when you first create your tables. The methods are also called when constructing a WHERE clause that includes the model field – that is, when you retrieve data using QuerySet methods like get(), filter(), and exclude() and have the model field as an argument. They are not called at any other time, so it can afford to execute slightly complex code, such as the connection.settings_dict check in the above example.
trans-unit.target: 在 db_type() 和 rel_db_type() 方法是由Django的时候框架构造叫做 CREATE TABLE 也就是说，当你第一次创建表-报表应用程序。在构造包含模型字段的 WHERE 子句时，也就是在调用方法时，即使用诸如 get() ， filter() 和 exclude() 之类的QuerySet方法检索数据并将模型字段作为参数时，也会调用这些方法。在任何其他时间都不会调用它们，因此它可以执行稍微复杂的代码，例如上例中的 connection.settings_dict 检查。

trans-unit.source: The rel_db_type() method is called by fields such as ForeignKey and OneToOneField that point to another field to determine their database column data types. For example, if you have an UnsignedAutoField, you also need the foreign keys that point to that field to use the same data type:
trans-unit.target: 所述 rel_db_type() 方法由字段，诸如称为 ForeignKey 的和 OneToOneField 该点到另一字段，以确定他们的数据库列的数据类型。例如，如果您具有 UnsignedAutoField ，则还需要指向该字段的外键以使用相同的数据类型：

trans-unit.source: The KEY_FUNCTION cache setting specifies a dotted-path to a function matching the prototype of make_key() above. If provided, this custom key function will be used instead of the default key combining function.
trans-unit.target: 所述 KEY_FUNCTION 缓存设置指定匹配的原型的功能的虚线路径 make_key() 以上。如果提供了此自定义键功能，它将代替默认的键组合功能。

trans-unit.source: The LOGGING_CONFIG setting defines the callable that will be used to configure Django’s loggers. By default, it points at Python’s logging.config.dictConfig() function. However, if you want to use a different configuration process, you can use any other callable that takes a single argument. The contents of LOGGING will be provided as the value of that argument when logging is configured.
trans-unit.target: 该 LOGGING_CONFIG 设置定义将被用于配置Django的记录器的调用。默认情况下，它指向Python的 logging.config.dictConfig() 函数。但是，如果要使用其他配置过程，则可以使用带有单个参数的任何其他可调用对象。配置日志记录时，将提供 LOGGING 的内容作为该参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The TEMPLATES setting and BASE_DIR will already exist if you created your project using the default project template. The setting that needs to be modified is DIRS.
trans-unit.target: 该 TEMPLATES 设置和 BASE_DIR 如果您使用的是默认项目模板创建你的项目已经存在。需要修改的设置是 DIRS 。

trans-unit.source: The Django template language is Django’s own template system. Until Django 1.8 it was the only built-in option available. It’s a good template library even though it’s fairly opinionated and sports a few idiosyncrasies. If you don’t have a pressing reason to choose another backend, you should use the DTL, especially if you’re writing a pluggable application and you intend to distribute templates. Django’s contrib apps that include templates, like django.contrib.admin, use the DTL.
trans-unit.target: 在Django的模板语言是Django自己的模板系统。在Django 1.8之前，它是唯一可用的内置选项。这是一个很好的模板库，尽管它自以为是，并且具有一些特质。如果没有紧迫的理由选择另一个后端，则应使用DTL，尤其是在编写可插拔应用程序且打算分发模板时。Django的contrib应用程序（包括django.contrib.admin等模板）使用DTL。

trans-unit.source: The include() function allows referencing other URLconfs. Whenever Django encounters include(), it chops off whatever part of the URL matched up to that point and sends the remaining string to the included URLconf for further processing.
trans-unit.target: 在 include() 函数允许引用其它的URLconf。每当Django遇到 include() 时，它都会砍掉匹配到该点的URL的任何部分，并将剩余的字符串发送到包含的URLconf进行进一步处理。

trans-unit.source: The OSGeo4W installer helps to install the PROJ, GDAL, and GEOS libraries required by GeoDjango. First, download the OSGeo4W installer (64bit), and run it. Select Express Web-GIS Install and click next. In the ‘Select Packages’ list, ensure that GDAL is selected; MapServer is also enabled by default, but is not required by GeoDjango and may be unchecked safely. After clicking next and accepting the license agreements, the packages will be automatically downloaded and installed, after which you may exit the installer.
trans-unit.target: 该OSGeo4W安装程序有助于安装由GeoDjango内置所需的PROJ，GDAL和GEOS库。首先，下载OSGeo4W安装程序（64位），然后运行它。选择“ Express Web-GIS安装”，然后单击“下一步”。在“选择软件包”列表中，确保选择了GDAL；默认情况下，MapServer也是启用的，但GeoDjango并不需要，并且可以安全地取消选中。单击下一步并接受许可协议后，将自动下载并安装软件包，然后退出安装程序。

trans-unit.source: The OSGeo4W installer helps to install the PROJ.4, GDAL, and GEOS libraries required by GeoDjango. First, download the OSGeo4W installer, and run it. Select Express Web-GIS Install and click next. In the ‘Select Packages’ list, ensure that GDAL is selected; MapServer and Apache are also enabled by default, but are not required by GeoDjango and may be unchecked safely. After clicking next, the packages will be automatically downloaded and installed, after which you may exit the installer.
trans-unit.target: 该OSGeo4W安装程序有助于安装PROJ.4，GDAL，并要求GeoDjango内置GEOS库。首先，下载OSGeo4W安装程序，然后运行它。选择“ Express Web-GIS安装”，然后单击“下一步”。在“选择软件包”列表中，确保选择了GDAL；默认情况下，MapServer和Apache也处于启用状态，但GeoDjango不需要它们，并且可能会被安全地取消选中。单击下一步后，将自动下载并安装软件包，然后退出安装程序。

trans-unit.source: The force_insert parameter is documented elsewhere, but all it means is that a new object will always be created. Normally you won’t need to worry about this. However, if your model contains a manual primary key value that you set and if that value already exists in the database, a call to create() will fail with an IntegrityError since primary keys must be unique. Be prepared to handle the exception if you are using manual primary keys.
trans-unit.target: 该force_insert参数记录在其他地方，但它的意思是，一个新的对象总是会被创建。通常，您无需为此担心。但是，如果模型包含您设置的手动主键值，并且该值已经存在于数据库中，则由于主键必须是唯一的，因此对 create() 的调用将失败，并出现 IntegrityError 。如果使用手动主键，请做好处理异常的准备。

trans-unit.source: The Manager is the main source of QuerySets for a model. For example, Blog.objects.all() returns a QuerySet that contains all Blog objects in the database.
trans-unit.target: 该 Manager 是主要来源 QuerySets 的模型。例如， Blog.objects.all() 返回一个 QuerySet ，其中包含数据库中的所有 Blog 对象。

trans-unit.source: The 'locmem' backend stores messages in a special attribute of the django.core.mail module. The outbox attribute is created when the first message is sent. It’s a list with an EmailMessage instance for each message that would be sent.
trans-unit.target: 该 'locmem' 后端存储在一个特殊的属性信息 django.core.mail 模块。该 outbox 被发送的第一消息时创建属性。这是一个列表，其中包含要发送的每个消息的 EmailMessage 实例。

trans-unit.source: The **extra kwargs are key=value pairs that can be interpolated into the template attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该 **extra kwargs是 key=value 可以插值到对 template 的属性。

trans-unit.source: The **extra kwargs are key=value pairs that can be interpolated into the template attribute. To avoid a SQL injection vulnerability, extramust not contain untrusted user input as these values are interpolated into the SQL string rather than passed as query parameters, where the database driver would escape them.
trans-unit.target: 该 **extra kwargs是 key=value 可以插值到对 template 的属性。为了避免SQL注入漏洞， extra 不得包含不受信任的用户输入，因为这些值将插入到SQL字符串中，而不是作为查询参数传递给数据库驱动程序将其转义的参数。

trans-unit.source: The **extra kwargs are key=value pairs that can be interpolated into the template attribute. To avoid an SQL injection vulnerability, extramust not contain untrusted user input as these values are interpolated into the SQL string rather than passed as query parameters, where the database driver would escape them.
trans-unit.target: 该 **extra kwargs是 key=value 可以插值到对 template 的属性。为了避免SQL注入漏洞， extra 不得包含不受信任的用户输入，因为这些值将插入到SQL字符串中，而不是作为查询参数传递，数据库驱动程序将在这些参数处对其进行转义。

trans-unit.source: The *expressions argument is a list of positional expressions that the function will be applied to. The expressions will be converted to strings, joined together with arg_joiner, and then interpolated into the template as the expressions placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 的 *expressions 参数是位置表达式列表，该函数将被应用到。表达式将转换为字符串，并与 arg_joiner 连接在一起，然后作为 expressions 占位符插入 template 中。

trans-unit.source: The --mapping option tells ogrinspect to also generate a mapping dictionary for use with LayerMapping.
trans-unit.target: 该 --mapping 选项告诉 ogrinspect 也产生映射字典与使用 LayerMapping 。

trans-unit.source: The --multi option is specified so that the geographic field is a MultiPolygonField instead of just a PolygonField.
trans-unit.target: 该 --multi 选项指明地理数据类型是 MultiPolygonField ，而不是只是一个 PolygonField 。

trans-unit.source: The --srid=4326 option sets the SRID for the geographic field.
trans-unit.target: 所述 --srid=4326 选项设置地理场的SRID。

trans-unit.source: The -R -S flags indicate that we do not want the user to have the ability to create additional users (roles) or to be a superuser, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 该 -R -S 标志指示，我们不希望用户必须创建其他用户（角色）或者是一个超级用户，分别的能力。

trans-unit.source: The @cached_property decorator caches the result of a method with a single self argument as a property. The cached result will persist as long as the instance does, so if the instance is passed around and the function subsequently invoked, the cached result will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 所述 @cached_property 装饰缓存与单个的方法的结果 self 参数作为一个属性。缓存的结果将一直持续到该实例，因此，如果实例被传递并且随后调用了该函数，则将返回缓存的结果。
